name: Simple Platformer (littlepurplemage)
description:
Construct 2 Platformer Game

A simple platformer game with 3 levels made on Construct 2 for GDEVWEB 2T 2021 - 2022.

It is primarily designed to be played on your phone's browser (but can still be played on a PC browser).

Designed and developed by littlepurplemage

Art Assets from kenney.nl
